name: Video Resume for LearnDash
author: E-Learning expert

sections.description:
This plugin stores the video progress on browser and resumes video on re-visit, it supports Vimeo, YouTube, Wistia and JWPlayer. It works on Learndash lesson and topic pages. It supports multiple video please refer to screenshot 2.

Video player list:

  • Vimeo
  • Youtube
  • Wistia
  • JWPlayer (Coming soon)
  • VooPlayer (Coming soon)
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with default LearnDash video resume feature?

Yes.

Will it works with JWPlayer iframe embed?

Not yet.

What happens if I login with different system or browser?

It will not resume as currently it is stored in browser itself but I am planning to give support for that too.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0.2

  • WordPress compatibility update.

1.1.0.1

  • Bug fixed: was not working on topic pages.

1.1.0

  • Added support for Wistia player.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
